title: Parametrization (geometry)
summary: In mathematics, and more specifically in geometry, parametrization (or parameterization; also parameterisation, parametrisation) is the process of finding parametric equations of a curve, a surface, or, more generally, a manifold or a variety, defined by an implicit equation. The inverse process is called implicitization.[1]  "To parameterize" by itself means "to express in terms of parameters".[2]
